item.title: Introduction
item.description: Motivation Many scientists agree that there is an ongoing reproducibility crisis within our community. This is certainly the anecdotal experience of the authors of repro.rocks who are academics and software engineers ourselves and have spent many hours sifting through code repositories trying to make experimental code work or to track down missing datasets. Our primary motivation is to help academics who want to find and reproduce scientific work to avoid having to spend lots of time doing so.
